name: sql
body:
###OPERATE the DB,,
###==>>select/delete/update/insert data from tables
###as a programmer,u do OPERATE the DB,,
###==>>select/delete/update/insert data from tables
###u operate the tables. [not design it.]

1:select xx from xx where [condition]

[condition] is the most import thing,
